keyboard_shortcuts._1: 投稿フォームを開いた状態で

settings.display_user_name_in_post: Display a name of user in a post
settings.display_user_screen_name_in_post: Display a id of user in a post
settings.display_created_at_in_post: Display created at in a post
settings.display_actions_in_post: Display an actions in a post
settings.enable_url_preview_in_post: Enable URL preview in a post
settings.thumbnailyze_attached_image_of_post: Show the attached image of a post in the thumbnail instead of raw
settings.enable_notification_sound_when_receiving: Enable the notification sound when receiving a new post
